div.div: at Stevens Point, Wis. | Community Stadium

tr.td: UWL wins toss, elects to receive
Jesse Vervelde kickoff 60 yards to the UWL05, Jacob Flegner return 15 yards to the UWL20 (Patrick Schultz; Britton Vernon).
Trent Cummings pass complete to Tony Bilderback for 33 yards to the UWSP47 (Mike Longmeyer).
Trent Cummings pass incomplete to Joel Oxton, QB hurry by John Kontowicz.
